rottapeli.domain.superclasses

Class Moveable

  • java.lang.Object
    • rottapeli.domain.superclasses.Entity
      • rottapeli.domain.superclasses.Positioned
        • rottapeli.domain.superclasses.Moveable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ball, Rat

    public class Moveable
extends Positioned
implements Updatable
    Entity that moves.

    Extend this class when implementing an Entity that can move and can cause collisions.

    Author:
    Pavel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Moveable

        public Moveable(double w,
        double h,
        double dir,
        double speed)
        Constructor.

        Without coordinates positions Entity at a defaultPosition().

        Parameters:
        w - Width of the Moveable Entity.
        h - Height of the Moveable Entity.
        dir - Direction to which Moveable Entity will move to.
        speed - Movement speed.

      • Moveable

        public Moveable(double x,
        double y,
        double w,
        double h,
        double dir,
        double speed)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        x - X position where Moveable Entity is created.
        y - Y position where Moveable Entity is created.
        w - Width of the Moveable Entity.
        h - Height of the Moveable Entity.
        dir - Direction to which Moveable Entity will move to.
        speed - Movement speed.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves this Entity for a tick of the timer. Stores old coordinates for collision calculation.

      • oldX

        public double oldX()
        Returns:
        X component of the previous coordinate.

      • oldY

        public double oldY()
        Returns:
        Y component of the previous coordinate.

      • xSpeed

        public double xSpeed()
        Returns:
        X component of the current speed.

      • ySpeed

        public double ySpeed()
        Returns:
        Y component of the current speed.

      • getDirection

        public double getDirection()

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(double dir)

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(double xspeed,
                double yspeed)
        Sets new direction by calculating speed components.
        Parameters:
        xspeed - X component of the speed.
        yspeed - Y component of the speed.

      • checkCollisions

        public void checkCollisions()
        Goes through all Entities and calls reactToCollision() if collision is detected.

      • reactToCollision

        public void reactToCollision(Entity other,
                    boolean notOnTheEdge)
        This method is called every collision in order to do further actions according to the collided entity's properties. Must be overriden if this Entity does anything on collisions.
        Parameters:
        other - Entity with which this Entity has collided.
        notOnTheEdge - true if other is truly inside this Entity, not simply on the edge.

      • collisionType

        public ApproachFrom[] collisionType(Positioned other)
        Returns the type of the collision that happened between this and other Entity.
        Parameters:
        other - Other Entity with which this Entity collided.
        Returns:
        collisionType(other)[0] tells if this Entity approached from left or right.

        collisionType(other)[1] tells if this Entity approached from above or below.

      • correctPosition

        public void correctPosition(Positioned other)
        Corrects position to prevent this entity being inside the other.
        Parameters:
        other - Entity in respect to which this entity's position is corrected.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method is called every tick on the timer.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Updatable
